<https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/4999/>
<@U13TWBRBL>  - that's expected - I did not enable security yet - you need to set authentication to false in the config file
but wanted to get this in before things change too much
ah i thought it might have to do with your comment re: security earlier, just wanted to make sure
yeah - I was not very clear - plus the setting is not actually in the config file - you basically need to add an `"authentication":false` to the config
